Name: BOMBFEST
About the game: BOMBFEST is an award-winning party game for you and up to three friends! Battle in wooden forts, on folding chairs, and inside the kitchen sink as you attempt to be the last player standing. Use bombs to eliminate your foes, but donâ€™t get caught in a chain reaction of explosions! Features: 4 player local multiplayer for friendly battles or settling grudges! 13 unique bombs for blowing away the competition! 14 hand-crafted stages for you to duke it out on! Plenty of options and modifiers to customize your experience! Unlock new bombs, stages, characters, and more as you play! 'This game is amazing... [it's] a genuinely hilarious experience.' - Jesse Cox, YouTube Personality
